CustomField.description: Select the type(s) of Payment Method(s) to allow when using this configuration. If one is not allowed on this configuration but the Transaction allows it, it still won't be available on the Transaction, if none set on the transaction these will be allowed
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select the type(s) of Payment Method(s) to allow when using this configuration. If one is not allowed on this configuration but the Transaction allows it, it still won't be available on the Transaction, if none set on the transaction these will be allowed
CustomField.label: Allowed Payment Methods
